Description: Louisiana-Pacific agreed to pay $49,724 to settle allegations that it failed to comply with federal right-to-know laws in 2015, 2016 and 2017 when it did not file necessary reports regarding a zinc compound used at the plant.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department
